description:
With a maximum output of 3100 lumens, power outages and after dark walks will never be the same. Running off of a powerful rechargeable 21700 battery, the E35R has 6 different modes that take you from “where’s that fake rock with the Airbnb key”, all the way to the night melting handful of sunshine.

  • 6 lighting modes: 30 lumens (69h), 150 lumens (21.3h), 350 lumens (9.3h), 1000 lumens (3.6h), 3100 lumen turbo (2.5h – only useable for 3 minutes at a time due to heat buildup) and 3100 lumen strobe
  • Onboard charging USB-C port means you no longer need to remove the battery to charge your light (you can still remove the battery)
  • Rugged aluminum body has type-III hard anodizing for an extra level of protection
  • Custom engineered reflector casts a wide, even flood light, with a 100° beam angle
  • Magnetic tail cap lets you attach your light to metal surfaces for hands-free lighting
  • Side-mounted switch turns the light on and off, cycles through modes, and engages the electronic lockout
  • LED power indicator on the side-mounted switch lets you know when it's time to replace or charge your battery
  • Regulated output maintains constant brightness throughout battery life
  • In the box: E35R, ARB-L21 5000mAh 21700 battery, holster, lanyard, spare O-ring, user manual and warranty card
name: Fenix E35R Rechargeable Flashlight
